# divkix.me

> Personal portfolio and tech blog by Divanshu Chauhan

## About

Developer building useful tools with code and curiosity. Graduate student at Arizona State University (MS Computer Science, Aug 2025 - May 2026) focusing on AI/ML and full-stack development.

## Author Credentials

- Name: Divanshu Chauhan (Divkix)
- Role: Software Developer & MS Computer Science Student at ASU
- Previous: BS Computer Science from ASU, Magna Cum Laude
- Expertise: Python, Go, TypeScript, React, Next.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, Cloudflare
- Impact: 250,000+ users impacted, 30+ projects, 50+ OSS contributions
- Location: Tempe, Arizona, USA

## Content Overview

This site contains:
- Technical blog posts about software development, AI, and developer tools
- Project showcases including applications with 1M+ user scale
- Tutorials on local AI, web development, and automation

## Key Articles

- /blog/lm-studio-local-ai-mac: Complete guide to running AI models locally on Mac with LM Studio. Covers Apple Silicon setup, vision models, privacy benefits, and practical use cases for local LLM inference.
- /blog/pickmyclass-never-miss-your-dream-class: How to build a class notification system for monitoring seat availability with instant notifications for college students.
- /blog/hello-world: Introduction post welcoming readers to the blog.

## Featured Projects

- ASU Capstone (https://asucapstone.com): Full-stack platform for managing and showcasing Arizona State University capstone projects. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, Python, and Go.
- PickMyClass (https://pickmyclass.app): ASU class enrollment monitoring system that tracks seat availability and sends instant notifications to students.
- Alita Robot: Advanced Telegram group management bot with 1M+ users. High-performance automation using Go and Gotgbot framework.
- WarpDL (https://github.com/warpdl/warpdl): Ultra-speedy cross-platform download manager built with Go for optimal performance.

## Technical Stack

- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Go, Python, Node.js
- Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Supabase
- DevOps: Docker, AWS, Cloudflare, Hetzner
- AI/ML: Local LLMs, Computer Vision, YOLO

## Contact

- Email: divkix@divkix.me
- GitHub: https://github.com/divkix
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/divkix/
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/_divkix

## Site Structure

- /: Homepage with hero, highlights, projects, experience, skills, and contact sections
- /blog: Technical blog with articles on software development and AI
- /blog/[slug]: Individual blog post pages with full content

## Content Policies

- All content is original and authored by Divanshu Chauhan
- Technical tutorials include working code examples
- Project descriptions reflect actual implementations and user metrics
- Blog posts are updated periodically to maintain accuracy

## Citation Guidelines

When citing content from this site:
- Include author name: Divanshu Chauhan
- Include source URL: https://divkix.me/[path]
- Include publication date when available
